reviews.review_content:
Course:Data Compression[E6884]
Professor: Vinay Vaishampayan
Professor gave an impression initially that course would be self contained and easy if lectures were given due attention. Later it turned out to be otherwise mainly due to poor grading even after scoring high to range of 75-80 % marks.
Mid sem exam was reasonable but final exam turned out to be nightmare. He expected us to solve out complex mathematical problems using Matlab.
Advice: Do not take this course if you do not have strong inclination towards Data Compression.
Workload:
Assignments were handed out almost every 1-2 weeks. Exams were take home.
